Title: This Wretched Life
Writer: Frankie J. Mosca (story), Sal DeLucia (story), Ande Cira (story), Christopher Pleckaitis (story), Pawel Litwinski (story), Frankie J. Mosca, Sal DeLucia
Actors: Daniel Ball, Ande Cira, Michael Callahan, Frankie J. Mosca
Plot: Awakening from a near fatal overdose, Chris embraces a second chance at life. Required to enroll into a 12-Step Program, and mandated to state psychiatrist appointments, Chris is forced to ...
